hero.subTitle: We promote civic attitude and educate people all over the world

content.text: We have created a test of political views that has been used by nearly half a million people, including many famous political figures. Based on your answers, the test matches you with the closest ideology, political party and a location on the political compass.

In a world in which journalism is increasingly partisan, we have created myPolitics News to uphold the principle of objectivity. Meanwhile, through myPolitics View, we promote a more ideology-based approach to increase understanding of views from the entire political spectrum.
We promote political activism by organising debates and interviews with youth organisations and politicians from across the political spectrum.
